      • loadFormat

        public TransformGroup loadFormat(String filePath,
                                 String fileName,
                                 float scale,
                                 AbstractBoundingVolume.BoundingVolumeType boundingVolumeType)
        Load the data, i.e., geometry and materials of a generic format file, and encapsulate it into a transformGroup.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path to the file to load.
        fileName - the name of the file content to load.
        scale - the scale of this format.
        boundingVolumeType - the type of BoundingVolume that must engulf this format.
        Returns:
        the loaded data of a generic format file encapsulated into a transformGroup.
